articles.author: Jack Healy
articles.title: For Asian Americans Wary of Attacks, Reopening Is Not an Option - The New York Times
articles.description: Facing a wave of animosity, many Asian Americans remain afraid of public places even as the coronavirus pandemic recedes.
articles.content: Many people said they were trying to strike a balance that lets them feel comfortable as much as they can in public. It can be an agonizing calibration just to take a walk: Will wearing a mask act as… [+1362 chars]

articles.author: Tumaini Carayol
articles.title: Zidansek and Pavlyuchenkova reach French Open semis after epic battles - The Guardian
articles.description: Tamara Zidansek and Anatstasia Pavlyuchenkova reached the semi-finals of the French Open, continuing the series of unexpected results in the women’s singles at Roland Garros
articles.content:
French Open 2021
  • Tamara Zidansek secures victory over Paula Badosa 7-5, 4-6, 8-6
  • Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova beats Elena Rybakina 6-7 (2), 6-2, 9-7
